meanings.definition: A line or mark made by folding or wrinkling
meanings.sent1: The paper had a crease from being folded.
meanings.sent2: She ironed out the crease in her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat on the paper, leaving a crease behind.
meanings.sent4: His smile formed a crease in the corner of his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The crease in the map showed where they had traveled.

meanings.definition: To make a line or mark by folding or wrinkling
meanings.sent1: He tried to crease the paper neatly.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally creased the photograph while packing.
meanings.sent3: The wind creased the pages of the book as it blew.
meanings.sent4: His brow creased in confusion as he tried to understand.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully creased the fabric before sewing.
